Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but we believe its true worth lies in the hands of someone like yourself who can appreciate and utilize it to its full potential. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000, which reflects not only its intrinsic value but also our confidence in your ability to make the most of it. We understand that this investment might be substantial, but we assure you that the quality and benefits associated with this product will far outweigh the cost. We look forward to discussing the details with you and potentially bringing this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
